content.detailedDescription: Went outside to see what the neighbors were looking at and saw a reflective ball like object moving thru the sky at slow speeds and watched it moves over the house and across town out of our sight. we took a picture of it as best as we could and it definately shows its shape. has no wings or trail of smoke behind it.
content.summary: Saw our neighbors looking and pointing in the sky so i went outside to see what it was thhey were looking at assuming a plane and saw a reflective ball shaped object moving slower than a ny planes ive seen fly through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
El 26 de septiembre de 2007, 15:41 hrs.Estaba de paseo en la zona de monta���as en donde excurisonistas de todo el  mundo llegan a escalar, es potrero hidalgo en hidalgo nuevo leon mexico, me adentre hacia las monta���as aproximadamente 3.5 km en donde solamente estaba yo sin ningun otro sonido realizado por el hombre, estaba tomando fotografias a los paisajes alrededor,aproximadamente una hora despues empece a revisar las fotografias que habia tomado en mi canon sd 750, entonces visualice un punto en una de las fotos y al hacer acercamiento con el soom mire un objeto que no estaba a mi vista  en el momento que tome la foto. 
no puedo describir que movimientos, direccion, color, tama���o o distancia en la que se encontraba porque, les repito, yo no lo estaba enfocando ni estaba a mi vista.
la envie a varias organizaciones de investigacion de ufo, pero hasta el dia de hoy nadie ha respondido mis correos.
content.summary: El objeto no estaba a mi vista, yo tomaba fotos a montañas

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on our deck relaxing when i noticed a fairly large orange-red-yellow glowing orb in the sky over our house. it was fairly low ascending south-southwest. we moved out onto the driveway to watch it as it ascended until it was out of sight. we notice a slight, distant humming noise as it went by, starting a little after it was past us. we have an airport south of us and see airplanes go in and out all the time. the direction of ascension of this orb did not fit with where the airport is. also, airplanes always have blinking lights, and this was entirely an orange glow. it went at a steady pace in a direct line until it was no longer in sight, beyond the stars. there was no cloud cover at the time.
content.summary: Glowing orb ascending across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
There was a few clouds but can see stars.  he saw a small light that looked like a satellite.  he said it was a little red to it. it was about 1000k in the exosphere, straight up above his head. at first he thought it was a satellite, then saw it change direction and taken off at a fast rate in a second. and disappeared out of sight.  

this report is what my husband told me. i am reporting this for him. the above is what he told me. hes just not educated like me in the ufo information. 
thank you for all your hard work. mufon
content.summary: On the tip of our exosphere 1000k or so a light changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday july 8 2012 at 7:05est my husband and i witnessed a silver coloured oviod shaped object in the skys above chatham, ontario canada. we had happened to be watching the little pair of red tailed hawks battle off the turkey vultures in our neighbourhood. that is what had our attention trained on the skys. all of a sudden we both spotted the object hovering in the sky. it appeared to be reflecting a silver colour and was ovoid in shape. silent and no lights blinking. it was very high in the sky. as high as the plane appeared to be.  there was also a commerical airliner (that was leaving a vapour trail) behind the object in the sky. 
my husband and i watched the oval shaped object hover in the sky for at least a minute once we had seen it. once the jet seemed to cross behind it, it (ufo) began to move rapidly (neither of us have ever seen anything manmade move that fast) in a southwestern direction. we both could not believe what we had just saw. i have seen things in the evening sky that may be questionalbe, but this is the first time i have seen a daytime object that strange. we are only 30 miles from the northern shores of lake erie, that in the past has seen its share of strange ufo activity on the lake. just curious if anyone in the area spotted this activity as well. thanks
content.summary: Silver ovoid craft spotted over city on the canadian side (north shore) of lake erie

content.detailedDescription: On july 5th, 2012 i was star gazing, as i usually do from sunset with occasional breaks until around 4-430 a.M., after my last and final break of the night i decided to go into our garage and grab a soda before heading in for the night,(garage is about 15-20 feet from our back door and this is where i sit to gaze, perfect vantage point for rising moon and orions belt)after coming back out from the garage and locking the door behind me i flicked the garage light off and something bright caught my attention through my peripherals, i looked up and there was a star-like light, very high in the night sky, jetting overhead, now, i live fairly close to an airport, so i know exactly what a plane looks, and sounds like, i can hear them coming for miles in advance, this was 3 in the morning and absolute silence. i ran inside and looked up any recent meteor showers or comets and none were supposed to happen until the 28th and 29th of this month, still a few weeks away by the way. then curiously i looked into what they would look like maybe this was a stray( i know wishful thinking) and the website said if it was a comet or meteor it would have a very clear tail and would odbviously be a comet/meteor. no trail/tail/emissions or anything. now that was the only one that i saw that night. the following night i was very eager to get back out and see if i couldnt spot another with just dumb luck or what have you, that night, july 6th 2012, from approx. 12 midnight to around 330 a.M. me and my 18 year old sister witnessed a total of 3 together, same shape, same brightness,speed, everything. the 3 werent together and were at different times, coming from different locations, but ineveitably traveling towardds the same area of the sky(big dipper region). now, the following night, july 7th 2012 is when i became absolutely convinced these objects were not comets/meteors. my sister also became very intrigued and joined me outside for a couple hours. after seeing about 3 or 4 more doing the exact same things as all the others the previous nights, my sister says, "oh my god, joe look at that!" i got up and looked where she was looking and i saw two star-like objects, obviously very high in the sky, seperated by small space but not seperate crafts, it was very clearly a cigar shaped craft/object. that being the 5th object that night i witnessed a total of 4 more. finally, last night, july 8th, 2012, i witnessed 4 more. this time it was a family event! 18 year old sister, 28 year old sister, 33 year old brother in law, 10 year old niece, and myself all witnessed a distant, star-like object jetting across the sky completely silent, only this time, once it got to a certain point in the sky, it stopped, effortlessly, and began to get so bright that my sisters thought whatever it was had exploded! after about 10-15 seconds of tremendous brightness, it dimmed back down and continued traveling in the same direction. this is only over the span of 4 nights but you better believe ill be back out there every night im able to and i strongly believe ill be seeing many more. from july 5th 2012 to july 8th 2012 i witnessed 15 total crafts/objects and this is just the beginning. ufo's or whatever you wanna call 'em, love the nw! i didnt know where else to post this but i had to get it out, i really really hope more people in portland have been seeing this and come forward, its time to open our eyes and stop denying what these are, instead of trying to dismiss 'em, accept it for what it is. thanks guys!
content.summary: Small star-like object jetting across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the night sky trying to catch a weird flash and these white lights appeared after review of the video they were not there originally.
it amazed me to know that my camera phone could pick these lights up it was very dark and i dint expect to be able to pick up anything including the weird white flash of light.
content.summary: Flashing random yellow lights that were not there when i filmed

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving my car on the way to the bank in diamond bar.
2. the object caught my eye as it was bright and shiny like a lens flare
3. didnt know what it was but, it had no wings or propellers.  it looked like a skinny blimp
4. it was moving fast and in an area that doesnt normally have planes flying over
5. i was curious too what it may be and was looking for my phone too capture it on video.
6. it flew downwards over the hill and i lost sight of it
content.summary: Saw a cigar shaped reflective object moving fast over chino hills.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down roseville road, heading toward watt ave, i noticed a bright blue light in the sky i assumed it was an airplane as there were many. but as i got closer it seemed to me that it was flying in an unusual pattern with no apparent direction. it looked like it was a lost bird flying in circles, going round and round until it finally shined very brightly and headed north in the night sky. my three year old was astonished by its beautiful light, and my husband and myself were baffled by the sight. i am very emotionally distraught as i have never believed in these things before. we did take a picture but its so small.
content.summary: Blue light seen in the sky

content.detailedDescription: As above ,fast moving star like size but moving in straight line very fast faster than anything ive ever seen.
content.summary: Same size and color as star but moved faster than anything ive ever seen untill i couldnt see anymore

content.detailedDescription: I noticed in the east from where i live a boomerang shaped light that was going south to north in a 45 degree angle and stopped abruptly, emitted a large flash of light in my direction then sped off south to north, ascending in a 45 degree angle extremely fast into the sky disappearing into cloud cover.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Solid boomerang light moved from south to north. hovered and emitted a large bright flash

content.detailedDescription:
Una esfera paso abajo de las nubes a gran velocidad, su movimiento era r���pido y lineal. 

cerca esta la ruta de los aviones que descienden a el aeropuerto benito ju���rez del df, estas v���as est���n claramente definidas por lo que su direcci���n era diferente a las comunes, fue directamente al sureste, era una esfera roja-anaranjada y no hacia ruido, el clima es nublado con vientos y tormentas el���ctricas.

perd��� contacto visual al pasar detr���s de un edificio.
content.summary: Esfera roja-anaranjada moviéndose al sureste a gran velocidad

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside on the front lawn when my sister looked up and saw a rotating object in the sky that seemed to be falling.  she called my name and said "look, is that a plane falling?" i then looked at it and became a bit nervous about it because it seemed to be falling.  i ran inside to get everyone else's attention. when my husband came out with his camera we saw a second similar object.  the first one began to go higher in the sky towards the mountains.  the second object followed the same pattern like the first one, stopping, rotating, and then ascending in the same direction as the other.   a third object much longer looking but duller in whiteness zoomed in the same direction as the first object.  it was too fast to be captured on camera.  after approximately 15 to 20 minutes, the two objects seemed to become closer to each other but never did they intercept.  we even called our neighbor to witness it and she too was amazed by the sight.  the feeling of witnessing these foreign objects was exciting and a bit nerve rattling at the same time.  the objects just kind of seemed to disappear into the sky... maybe because of the distance of the objects.   we had never witnessed something that left us questioning its truth like these three objects we saw this evening.
content.summary: What was that?

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on my back in the pool on a float thinking and looking at the stars.. as a movment off to the left drew my attention to a fast moving light at first glance i thought/hoped it was a meteor, then a second and as the speed was slow and jet like i went back to thinking about things and how cool technology and plains have gotten to go so fast, and then.. straight up, i saw the brightest star ever and it kept getting brighter untill i realised, "this is it.. im dead.. i guess it was a 2012 meteor"..Then, it makes a left tward the east and out of sight.. my next thought was "rocket re-directed"? "check the news.. as hour or so goes by, internet say im not the only one to see it.. and the jets.
content.summary: Orb of light mistaken for meteor makes a right turn away from jets

content.detailedDescription: I live close to a commuter airport in lee's summit, mo and know what helicopters and planes look like, plus they all have flashing lights and make noise.  this orb pulsated, orange, moved at the appearent speed of a helicopter, no sound and under the cloud cover in a straigh flight path until it appeared to accelerate and ascend through the clouds shrinking into a small white ball, too fast and straight to be a balloon or lantern. note, this was under the clouds, so it wasn't a planet, space station or satelite. this was the best of 5 sightings i've had in the last month over lee's summit, mo (suburb of kansas city).  i've never seen them before.  my wife, a devot catholic, and non believer in ufo's or aliens witnessed one with me on 4th of july and is freaking out. i'm an engineer, trained to think logically, and i can't explain these sitings.  it's very disturbing.
content.summary: Orange orb under cloud cover moving due north.  ascended thru clouds out of site.  pulsating, not flashing. speed of helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: Had enough time to take pics. object remained in sky. bright beams.
content.summary: Observed outside window at a standstill for 2 hrs. vert bright beams.

content.detailedDescription: Had enough time to take pics. object remained in sky. bright beams.
content.summary: Observed outside window at a standstill for 2 hrs. vert bright beams.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were traveling across town (syracuse, ny) to dine at a restaurant, twin trees in solvay around 3pm. she was driving and i was watching the skies. i always watch the sky. as we were getting close to milton ave., in solvay, i noticed a weird shaped object just above the cumulus clouds. it was a disk shape and quite a distance away, approximately 2000~3000 feet high.

i then told her to pull over in a parking lot. i had to get out of the car. i watched it flop back and forth while it descended and ascended higher and higher. it was like a roller coaster pattern. this thing had to be big! it was as big as an aspirin and dark in color. i did see a reflected area of the craft momentarily as it waffled back and forth. i watched this strange event for about 5 minutes as it disappeared out of my line of sight.

my girlfriend did not see a thing. she thinks that i am crazy. this is not the first time for me. 2 years ago i had a close encounter (2) with 3 rectangle shapes just above the road from which i was traveling on. that was nuts and i was scared!
content.summary: Acsending disk waving back and forth above the low lying clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving through a neighborhood in andover, mn on the night of 7/07/12 around 10:30-11:00 pm with on of my friends when we noticed a bright orange orb of light floating around in the sky. at first it looked quite close (basketball sized) and after a couple minutes of bobbing around it took off in one direction weaving a bit almost like it was swimming through the air from side to side. we followed it as close as we could but eventually the light got smaller and smaller (golf ball sized) and eventually the orange light disappeared and in it's place was 2 navigational lights perhaps, blinking white and red quite rapidly. then it continued on with that same bizarre side to side motion.  we took a video but the quality is bad and we were too busy freaking out to capture it when it was at its largest size.

what's strange is i've had 2 of my friends from the same area describe seeing something like this from their back yards at night in the past. also one of my other friends saw one in the sky 2 nights ago (on 7/6/12) also in the same area.

when i heard about what happened in missouri (125 of them seen) i had to report this to someone. please tell me if you have any theories on this, i've always believed in aliens and this sighting confirmed it for me and turned my friend into a believer as well.  whatever it was it was not a plane and most definitely not man made (as far as i know, who knows what technology the government really has).
content.summary: Glowing orange orb floating in the sky, wobbling a bit then taking off at speed.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo over hollywood - thin long disc glowing orange / white ... too fast to be a blimp, no planes in sight... anybody else see it??
content.summary: Ufo over hollywood - thin long disc glowing orange / white ... too fast to be a blimp, no planes in sight... anybody else see it??

content.detailedDescription: I am sketchy about the actual dates because at the time i was a kid.  but it has always been on my mind and i remember it so clearly.  my dad & i were driving back from brinkley ar late at night on interstate 40 toward little rock.  it was around 8:45 or 9pm.  my dad looked out in the night sky and said, "hey, look at that bright star!"  we drove a little bit further he looked again & said, "it must be a shooting star. make a wish." it caught his eye again because usually a shooting star will go out eventually. but this one didn't. i asked my dad, "what do you thik it could be?"  he said maybe it's a search helicopter. it seemed to be moving in a zig zag pattern. so we kept on driving down the road & the light kept getting stronger and closer. and eventhough we were moving too it seemed to be moving with us.  we kept watch on it and when it came really close my dad pulled off the road onto the shoulder. we stayed in the truck until it was about to fly over us then we both got out.  about the time it was flying over i looked over at the road to see the other drivers. i wanted to see if anyone else was seeing what we were seeing.  when i looked over at the other cars most everyone was stopped even in the middle of the interstate. even some big rig trucks were stoped.  all looking up at what we were looking at.  i looked back up and it started to fly over us. it was so big i couldn't even describe it's size. it was huge. it had a pointed nose, wings and fire coming out the back. the fire was like that of a space ship. it was the same shape too, round and tube like.  the ship was a flat black with no reflection on it. it looked like a stealth bomer.  the wierdest thing i remember about it, ther was no sound. it was calm and quiet. you would think a ship that size and with rocket like fule coming out of the back of it it would be extremely loud. but it wasn't. it seemed to move very slow as if it were gliding though the air. we had pulled over right by a row of power lines and it just continued to decend slowly over those power lines until it was out of sight. i was never scared and almost in a calm state. i should have been in a panic, but no i was accepting of what was happening & wathcing it disappear. we got back in the truck talked about it for a minute then drove away. it didn't seem like anyone on the interstate that night said anything to each other or even paid attention to each other. we all just calmly accepted it and went on our way. when we arrived home my mother was watching the news and we began to tell her about what had happened.  i don't think at first she believed us until they started to do a news segment on it. we all listened and the news reported that it was a fragment of a satelite that was falling to earth. they also said it landed in romance ar. and that was all that was ever reported about it that i know of.
content.summary: Dark stelth plane looking object with no sound flew over i40 in ar

content.detailedDescription: It was around 3am late july 1994. i woke up to the sound of thunder from a distance. i went to my bedroom window to take a look,the lightning was lighting up my whole yard. i was living on top of read mountain in roanoke va. and we would get real bad thunderstorms but this one was different it seemed there was more lightning with this storm. as i was looking out my window i caught a glimpse of a light streaking threw the right of my yard, i turned my head to see what it was, i caught the back end of it just for a second before it went into some trees. i walked out on my pourch to look around. as i walked outside the air seemed to be thinner and had a static feel to it. also the temperature was dropping because it felt real cool, but when the wind blew the air was almost hot, it was realy strange. i was looking over at the trees were i had lost sight of the light when i was looking out my bedroom window. about a minute passed and i observed the light coming out of the tree line back towards the house it had a brilliant white light that was at that time pulsing slowly, it looked like it was coming right up to the pourch and i got a rush over my whole body it was like a very intense excited feeling that i felt i wasnt going to be able to control and it was getting worse as it got closer. then it suddenly stopped about 10 to 15 feet in front of the pourch, about 15 to 20 feet from me. it hovered for a couple of minutes. i had no idea what i was looking at. to the best of my knowledge it was nothing i have ever heard of. i stepped to the left towards my front door and it moved to its right to stay in front of me so i just froze there, as i was standing there it moved right towards me getting about a foot from me it moved around me in a 360 degree circle keeping the same distanced away from me. it made two more circles around me and hovered in front of me for about 25 or 30 seconds, i raised my arm up from my side slowly as to reach out and touch it and it immediatly backed up in straight line about ten feet and started pulsating at a very rapid speed, about 10 seconds later it shot straight up into the sky and it started to rain so hard, i opened the front door to go back inside as i intered the house i bumped into my brother in the dark, he was in a state of shock so to speak he had wittnessed the entire event. we both had that intense excited feeling for about 72 hours afterwards. i have wittnessed these orbs on several different occasions. has anyone out there experienced this or something close to it?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Right before a thunderstorm orbs appeared,they seemed intelligent sort of checking me out.

content.detailedDescription: At a 11 pm i let the dogs out and looked up and saw five orange spheres about 5 to 10 miles away no strobe on them . i watched then hover then start to move toward me and then stop reverse corse and fly up into space this has kept me up these r not plane stars or planets some one else had to see these i look on utube and saw the same thing i saw on ther i hope u can find out what this is ty david hinds
content.summary: 5 orange spheres that hovered and moved in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in salem new hampshire and work in downtown boston it's about a 37 mile commute one way and i do it every day.
it was about 2:30 mabey a little later in the morning {am}there was nothing unusal about the night very normal night i come home ,sometimes i stop and look up at how brilent the night sky sometimes is and just then from my left comes this round yellow /orange ball low in the sky above the tree tops moving at a good clip, east to west toward nashua, it was flying parallal with rt 28 the major road that runs through salem n.H, i am curious if any one else saw this thing.

p.S have there been any metor crashes in the past 24 months east to west flight path just thinking!

sincerly donald roche
content.summary: Large round object flys over me while in my drivewaycoming home from work

content.detailedDescription:
Husband and i arrived home at 9 pm, he gets out of car and points "look, look!" i turn and over the roof of our house we see 4 or 5 red lights, the lead light brighter than the rest and looks to be traveling at different altitudes. at first i thought they were flares or fireworks, but they traveled rather quickly with a slight back and forth or sinusoidal movement, no sound at all (and it's very quiet at our house). there was some marine layer cover, not sure how low, but the lights were clearly visible and lit the clouds. they traveled from south to north, we watched them for about 2 minutes and when they were directly overhead they began to move together and ascend out of sight, one at a time, with the lead and brightest light disappearing last. 
obviously throughout this sighting husband and i are asking "what are they?" neither of us has ever seen anything quite like this before. they did not drop like flares and did not drop any phosphorous material. the movement just before they ascended and disappeared  was in keeping with flare movement. 

the lights did not blink, as one would expect from a plane or other aeronautical device.
content.summary: 4-5 red unblinking lights traveling north, loose formation, moved together ascended out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Husband and i arrived home at 9 pm, he gets out of car and points "look, look!" i turn and over the roof of our house we see 4 or 5 red lights, the lead light brighter than the rest and looks to be traveling at different altitudes. at first i thought they were flares or fireworks, but they traveled rather quickly with a slight back and forth or sinusoidal movement, no sound at all (and it's very quiet at our house). there was some marine layer cover, not sure how low, but the lights were clearly visible and lit the clouds. they traveled from south to north, we watched them for about 2 minutes and when they were directly overhead they began to move together and ascend out of sight, one at a time, with the lead and brightest light disappearing last. 
obviously throughout this sighting husband and i are asking "what are they?" neither of us has ever seen anything quite like this before. they did not drop like flares and did not drop any phosphorous material. the movement just before they ascended and disappeared  was in keeping with flare movement. 

the lights did not blink, as one would expect from a plane or other aeronautical device.
content.summary: 4-5 red unblinking lights traveling north, loose formation, moved together ascended out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friend's house on a 5 mile lake with 3 other 14 year-old friends. this bright light came through the cracks of the window shutters inside the bedroom. the other girl noticed it first. her brother said that it couldn't be their mom because she worked till 10 o'clock,(another hour away). we noticed that the light became brighter, and closer to the house as if it were coming down the dead end lane. they lived at the end of a lane along a 5 mile long lake. it was maybe a mile or less wide. he opened the shutters, and there in front of us was a ball of light that had red and blue lights rotating around the middle of the object. they flashed on and off as they rotated. we stood there together side by side, all 4 of us for an undetermined time. it seemed like a minute, but it seemed longer too. the window was big enough to fit all 4 of us, and to allow us to equally see the object. it was silent. we were all dumbfounded, and stared at it, not moving, not screaming, no-one was afraid. it then moved up, over the house; so we ran down the stairs and through the sliding glass doors that were already open. that probably took us 10-15 seconds to do. their backyard was on the lake shore, so we stood next to the water and watched it in a standstill position across the 5 mile lake, and way up in the sky. it was so small that it looked like an over-sized star. no more could you see the red and blue lights. it sat stationary for about 4-5 minutes, when it moved straight up quite slowly for another minute; and then zoomed to the northwest until it disappeared. this action took less than 4 seconds. there was never a sound made by the object. we immediately called the police station and they blew us off, saying it was a weather balloon and so did our parents. i moved to southern fla. after that, and all was forgotten until a friend turned me on to tapes of other ufo sightings. i would like to be hypnotized to see how accurate my memory is, to which i think i haven't left anything out, or to see if we were in fact, abducted. i've heard that some people that have seen them, were abducted, but don't remember. oh, and none of us had a clue what it was, because we hadn't heard of ufo's. our parents had, but they didn't believe they existed.
content.summary: 4 14 year-olds observed a bright light through a bedroom window . upon curiosity, opened shutters to see a round ball of blinding light that had red and blue flashing lights around the middle of the object. after time, it went up over the house, and  to t

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my son to his fathers house while he was looking out the window to watch some of the fireworks that people were shooting off. most of them were only just above the tree line and he was disappointed that we couldnt go over and see them closer. all of a sudden he yells out that he sees a ufo. of course, as a parent i count it to a childs over active imagination and tell him its probably just a cool firework. he stands his ground and contines telling me it wasnt fireworks. all of a sudden he yells out again that another one has joined the first one and they are flying in the sky. because im driving i cant look out the window to where he is pointing and still think its probably fireworks. the next day i check the reports of the last couple days and notice there is one from a man in belton that sees exactly what my son was describing. pretty fascinated that he actually did see a ufo i contact ks mufon who urges me to make a report on it. i think its pretty cool that after all the sightings i have had my son has had one himself now.
content.summary: Orange glowing x like ufos spotted off 71 hwy in belton mo

content.detailedDescription: Outside taking still shots of a rainbow with my camera (cybershot).  i never noticed the object with the naked eye but later when i came in to upload pics i happened to notice the orb. i thought the object could have been preciptation but as you can tell there was not a drop of rain around us and the wind was pretty calm at the time.  the object was just in one frame of the shots that i took. bright white orb. the object never appeared to the naked eye.  could have been just precip but the storm died before arriving at airport and developed on the north side of town after completely dying out before arriving at airport.
content.summary: Still shot of rainbow orb appears in one shot

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the beach facing south watching the waves. the sun had just set and was covered by clouds. we had been watching a fireworks show about 2 miles to our west. during the show a small lightning storm had formed over the ocean. the firewors ended and light rain had started. i faced east looking at a few camp fires down the beach. when i noticed some objects glowing orange appear to come around montauk point. they flew out over the ocean and one by one dissapeared. i thought it was strange but said nothing. then appeared 3 more but flying in a formation so i told my girlfriend to check out the lights flying in formation. we watched for a minute, then they seperated and dissapeared over the ocean. not slowly, but they were just gone. we both were like whoa. more came from around the point. and proceded to do the same kind of actions i was not really thinking ufos until they formed a triangle and a fourth one appeared way to our left.(north) and joined them and dissapeared as well. this went on for 20 mins or so. the lights mostly started low in the sky and gained height before dissappearing. there was noise in the area, random fireworks and thunder rumbles as well as ocean noise and people talking, but i heard no man made craft noises. i had a small digital camera wth me and i tried to shoot video and stills of the lights, but the camera was new and it was so dark that i really could not see the function buttons. i did get some video but it is a bit shakey and none of the stills came out.(i have not imported it yet).. so now i get frustrated and it starts pouring rain. so i suggest we go to our hotel room and set the camera right and then go to montauk point about 6 miles away and see if we can get closer to these lights. my girfriend was exited and nervous along the way and was actually scared about abduction. we got to camp hero in montauk point and it was pitch black.  not one light in the sky. there where 10 to 15 fishing? boats in the area off the point. i would assume they would have also seen something. we then went back west about 4 miles to see if we could spot the lights again but they did not reappear and it was raining too hard. i am not looking for anyhing and have no reason to lie. we are both professionals and educated. i am a pro cameraman who works for a major news organization. wish i had my pro gear on vacation with me. i am also an avid fisherman who has spent countless hours looking at the sky at night. i have watched satellites and the glow of the sun off the sides of planes, plenty of helicopters with varying light schemes too but this was very very odd. i have no problem talking with an investigator if you find that warrented. thank you.
content.summary: My girlfriend and i where sitting on the beach from sunset till after dark.We witnessed 15-20 orange objects fly from mtk point to over the ocean and dissapear.
